ygData.subject: RE: Anti-Camping ?-Spolier kinda-
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello there, The Robe of the ORACLE  is located on the oracle of Ar knon who is on a island in OOT. I am no where close to being able to go there, so Ill wait
ygData.messageBody:
Hello there,

The Robe of the ORACLE is located on the oracle of Ar'knon who is on a
island in OOT. I am no where close to being able to go there, so Ill wait
another 6 levels.

Barbed Leather Whip is on the Bone Crusher or Goblin Magician in Najena

The Bone Bladed Claymore is in Befallen on the 3rd level held by a Shadow
Knight

Gladius is in "Unrest" on a rare spawn called the Lesser Blade Fiend

Polished Granite Tomahawk is in Highhold held by Grenix Muck Tail

Crystaline Blade is in Everfrost held by a Goblin Champion

Demon claws.. ?? dont know..

As far As the jorneyman boots, they give you a temporary SoW. It has
unlimited charges, so you can run around all the time like you are SOWed

Anything else you need info on ?

Thanks

Reuben

Nate
Lvl 17 Magician
Rodcet Nife

-----Original Message-----
From: SFRune@... [mailto:SFRune@...]
Sent: Friday, August 13, 1999 11:57 AM
To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Anti-Camping ?


From: SFRune@...

My highest character is a Magician14... then a Bard13, so I'm kinda
unfamiliar with the really good items and how to get them. Except the Oracle
Robe.. just kill that Oracle. ((Of course 've never actually done it hehe)).
What exactly are the journeyman boots? Everyone just says it gives the
journeyman effect... And is there a specific place to get a BBC? Any place
to get a barbed leather whip? Demon Claws? "Gladius"? Crystalline Sword?
PGT?? AHHHHH!!! So many!!!!! Any help would be appreciated :~)

Thanks all! heheh
Caz-Thu
~Thyndo~Galaen~Mystir~
**Andrew**

In a message dated 8/10/99 9:39:37 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
hamlet@... writes:

<< I spent 9 hours straight waiting for jman's boots to spawn for me. They
never did. Drelzna spawned during that time, she just didn't have the
boots.

There's no anti-camp code there, though. The place is camped on Tunare
24/7
and people come away with boots. A friend of mine went there and got them
on the first spawn (the wench! ;)

I think I just have horrible luck with spawns like this. The same thing
happened for the BBC =P >>
